text: Paolo Giani Margi (born 11 February 1959) is an Italian equestrian. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:People from Gallarate
title: Paolo Giani Margi
